Ultramarine

The in situ Raman analysis of the blue pigment showed for almost all folios and the bifolio, that ultramarine (Na8–10Al6Si6O24S2–4) is used as blue pigment.

Source

Deneckere, A., De Reu, M., Martens, M., De Coene, K., Vekemans, B., Vincze, L., … Moens, L. (2011). The use of a multi-method approach to identify the pigments in the 12th century manuscript Liber Floridus. SPECTROCHIMICA ACTA PART A-MOLECULAR AND BIOMOLECULAR SPECTROSCOPY, 80(1), 125–132. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.saa.2011.03.005

Greenmixture

The pigment responsible for the green colour could not been identified with Raman or XRF spectroscopy. Looking at the sample under the microscope, it showed green, yellow and blue particles. Analysis of the blue grains with Raman spectroscopy revealed the use of ultramarine. Probably the blue pigment was mixed with a yellow lake, to produce the green colour.

Source

Deneckere, A., De Reu, M., Martens, M., De Coene, K., Vekemans, B., Vincze, L., … Moens, L. (2011). The use of a multi-method approach to identify the pigments in the 12th century manuscript Liber Floridus. SPECTROCHIMICA ACTA PART A-MOLECULAR AND BIOMOLECULAR SPECTROSCOPY, 80(1), 125–132. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.saa.2011.03.005

Vermilion

The in situ Raman analysis of the red pigment showed that vermilion (HgS) is used as red pigment.

Source

Deneckere, A., De Reu, M., Martens, M., De Coene, K., Vekemans, B., Vincze, L., … Moens, L. (2011). The use of a multi-method approach to identify the pigments in the 12th century manuscript Liber Floridus. SPECTROCHIMICA ACTA PART A-MOLECULAR AND BIOMOLECULAR SPECTROSCOPY, 80(1), 125–132. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.saa.2011.03.005

Fore-edge bookmark

A long piece of the parchment was cut in order to fold and loop the parchments piece through the cut in the page thereby making a stub of parchment stick out on the side.

Sithiu uilla

Source

Lambertus a S. Audomaro, L. a S. Audomaro, Derolez, A., & Strubbe, E. I. (1968). Lamberti S. Audomari canonici Liber floridus : codex autographus bibliothecae universitatis Gandavensis. Gand: Story-Scientia. https://lib.ugent.be/en/catalog/rug01:000066991
Verzen over de heilige Audomarus, bisschop der Morinen.

De streek Coutances, de plaats Orval, de vader Friulfus, de moeder Domitta genaamd, Zo, Audomarus, zal ik de oorsprong van uw leven beschrijven. Hijzelf, een sieraad der gelukzaligen en een spiegel der monniken, Werd monnik en legde zich onvermoeid toe op de taken van de monnik: Hij zong psalmen voor Christus; wanneer zijn tong zweeg, Volbracht hij geloften aan God, bedacht hij nieuwe gezangen in zijn binnenste. Hij was sober en kuis, in alle aangelegenheden rechtvaardig, Bovenal nederig, vroom en in alle opzichten zachtmoedig. Hij betoonde zich een model van goede zeden, In alles opgewekt, vrij van alle neerslachtigheid. Als bisschop toonde hij hoe er moest gehandeld worden en zo handelde hij zelf, Met heel zijn hart zocht hij de geheimen van het leven in rust, Vervulde met onderwijs van het geloof aardsgezinde harten met vrees. Als leraar die zich bovenal vaak op de heilige vasten toelegde Werd die prelaat al vastend een leerling. O, wat een zachtmoedig man, hoe goedertieren, hoe gelukzalig, Hoe goed en rechtvaardig, God in alle opzichten welgevallig! Hij die het goed van het beschouwende leven niet wilde kwijtraken Regeert nu met de gemeenschap der heiligen in de hemelse burcht. Amen.

Versvs de sancto avdomaro, morinorvm episcopo.

Source

Lambertus a S. Audomaro, L. a S. Audomaro, Derolez, A., & Strubbe, E. I. (1968). Lamberti S. Audomari canonici Liber floridus : codex autographus bibliothecae universitatis Gandavensis. Gand: Story-Scientia. https://lib.ugent.be/en/catalog/rug01:000066991

Constatinensis regio, locus Aurea Vallis, Friulfus genitor, genitrix Domitta uocata, Audomare, tuę referam exordia uitę. Iste beatorum decus et speculum monachorum, Et monachus factus monachi uigilauit in actus; Christo psallebat; si quando lingua tacębat, Vota Deo soluit, noua cantica pectore uoluit. Sobrius et castus, per cuncta negotia iustus, Pre cunctis humilis, pius atque per omnia mitis: Exemplar morum se prebuit ipse bonorum, in cunctis letus, nullo memore repletus. P[/resul]agenda quidem monst /abat, agebat et idem, Toto corde duo querens secreta quietis Pauit doctrina terrestrial corda fideli. Doctor pre cunctis ieiunia sancta frequentans, In ieiunando prelatus fit studiosus. Ó quam dulcis homo, quam Clemens quamque beatus, Quam bonus et iustus Dominoque per omnia gratus, Contemplatiuę nolens bona perdere uitę! Iam cum sanctorum grege regnat in arcę polorum. AMEN.

Source

Lambertus a S. Audomaro, L. a S. Audomaro, Derolez, A., & Strubbe, E. I. (1968). Lamberti S. Audomari canonici Liber floridus : codex autographus bibliothecae universitatis Gandavensis. Gand: Story-Scientia. https://lib.ugent.be/en/catalog/rug01:000066991

dit et, si in puteum ceciderit, potantes ex eo morientur. Viuit autem in mediis flammis et non uritur, sed extinguit incendium. Scorpio animal armatum aculeo caudam figit et ideo inter serpentes numeratur, quia arcuate uulnere uenena diffundit. Stellio tergo depictus scorpionibus est contrarius, ut uiso eo pauorem infefrat. Sunt et alia genera serpentium, uidelicet admoditę, elefantię et dracontes. Lacerta et stilion, quia IIIIor nituntur pedibus, non serpentes sed reptilia sunt. Lacertorum plura sunt genera, ut botrix, saura, stellio, Salamandra. Saura lacertus quando senescit cecantur eius oculi, et intrans in foramen parietis orto sole intendit contra radios et illuminantur eius oculi. Omnes autem serpentes natura frigidi sunt nec percutiunt nisi quando calescunt. Quando autem sunt frigidi, nullum tangunt. Vnde et uenena eorum plus die quam nocte nocent, quia frigidi sunt nocturno rore. Costis autem et squamarum nisibus repunt, squamis quasi unguibus, costis quasi cruribus innituntur. Quando autem senescunt, senectutem cum pelle deponent.

Source

Lambertus a S. Audomaro, L. a S. Audomaro, Derolez, A., & Strubbe, E. I. (1968). Lamberti S. Audomari canonici Liber floridus : codex autographus bibliothecae universitatis Gandavensis. Gand: Story-Scientia. https://lib.ugent.be/en/catalog/rug01:000066991

COCODRILLVS a croceo colore dictus in Nilo fluuio gignitur, animal quadrupes in terra et aqua ualens, longitudine XXti cubitorum, dentium et unguium immanitate armatum, tantaque cutis duritia ut tela ictusque lapidum tergo repercutiat; iua in terra fouet, masculus et femina uices seruant; faciem habet hominis, sed ędendo non inferiurem molam, ut homo, sed superiorem mouit. Hunc delfinus serratus interficit. Amphyuia sunt genera piscium ambulandi in terris usum et natandi in aquis habentes officium, ut focę et ypotami. Yppotamus in Nilo fluuio ęquo similis, dorso iubato, [/maior elephanto, cauda tortuosa, resupinato ore, hinnitus emittens commoratur depascens segetes. Huiusmodi bestię CCtos milites Alexandri per amnem natantes rapuerunt et crudeliter affecerunt].

Source

Lambertus a S. Audomaro, L. a S. Audomaro, Derolez, A., & Strubbe, E. I. (1968). Lamberti S. Audomari canonici Liber floridus : codex autographus bibliothecae universitatis Gandavensis. Gand: Story-Scientia. https://lib.ugent.be/en/catalog/rug01:000066991

Bęhemoth est belua et animal quadrupes dentium imanitate amatum, et linguam exerit, habens cornua arietum similia et eius cartilago quasi lamminę ferreę, habens testiculos perplexes et pedes animalis, cuius ossa sunt sicut fistulę ęris. Habet autem ccaudam draconis atrocem et longam quasi cędrus. Caude quidęm ligat dentibusque uulnerat. Huic mille montes herbas fęrunt, quibus pascitur, fenum sicut bos comedens et fluuium absorbens. Sub umbra enim dormit in secreto calami in locis humentibus. A mundi ergo origine exortus ipso transeunte peribit. Significant autem diabolum qui de excelsis ad ima ruit et pro merito suo ut animal brutum effectus est. Significant etiam Antichristum perditionis filium in fine uenturum, /qui in quantum poterit cooperante diabolo perdet genus humanum et in nouissimo seipsum\.

Source

Lambertus a S. Audomaro, L. a S. Audomaro, Derolez, A., & Strubbe, E. I. (1968). Lamberti S. Audomari canonici Liber floridus : codex autographus bibliothecae universitatis Gandavensis. Gand: Story-Scientia. https://lib.ugent.be/en/catalog/rug01:000066991

Cęlum superioris circuli Deum uirtutesque continet angelicas, quod Deus glacialibus aquis solidauit. Cęlum huic proximum continet infixos stellarum cursus eternos. Cęlum a suppremo tertium celestes continet potestates. Cęlum á superno quartum continet angelos et archangelos, qui ad nos nuntiando exuent. Celum a suppremo Vtum continet paradysum, in quo Paulus fuerat raptus, ubi perfectorum animę locantur, Augustino testante. Cęlum huic proximum dicitur firmamentum multiplici motu solidatum propter sustentacionem superiorem aquarum ad ignem syderum temperandum. Cęlum inferius ęthereum iacincto simile terris est proximum. Omnis terra quę colitur parua insula est circumfusa mari Oceano, quę in parte Septentrionali a filiis Adę colitur media; partem autem alteram, Australem uidelicet, ut ferunt, antipodes obtinent.

Source

Lambertus a S. Audomaro, L. a S. Audomaro, Derolez, A., & Strubbe, E. I. (1968). Lamberti S. Audomari canonici Liber floridus : codex autographus bibliothecae universitatis Gandavensis. Gand: Story-Scientia. https://lib.ugent.be/en/catalog/rug01:000066991

ZODIACVS CIRCVLVS PER QVEM PLANETE CVRRVNT

Source

Lambertus a S. Audomaro, L. a S. Audomaro, Derolez, A., & Strubbe, E. I. (1968). Lamberti S. Audomari canonici Liber floridus : codex autographus bibliothecae universitatis Gandavensis. Gand: Story-Scientia. https://lib.ugent.be/en/catalog/rug01:000066991

Ultramarine

The in situ Raman analysis of the blue pigment showed for almost all folios and the bifolio, that ultramarine (Na8–10Al6Si6O24S2–4) is used as blue pigment.

Source

Deneckere, A., De Reu, M., Martens, M., De Coene, K., Vekemans, B., Vincze, L., … Moens, L. (2011). The use of a multi-method approach to identify the pigments in the 12th century manuscript Liber Floridus. SPECTROCHIMICA ACTA PART A-MOLECULAR AND BIOMOLECULAR SPECTROSCOPY, 80(1), 125–132. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.saa.2011.03.005

Greenmixture

The pigment responsible for the green colour could not been identified with Raman or XRF spectroscopy. Looking at the sample under the microscope, it showed green, yellow and blue particles. Analysis of the blue grains with Raman spectroscopy revealed the use of ultramarine. Probably the blue pigment was mixed with a yellow lake, to produce the green colour.

Source

Deneckere, A., De Reu, M., Martens, M., De Coene, K., Vekemans, B., Vincze, L., … Moens, L. (2011). The use of a multi-method approach to identify the pigments in the 12th century manuscript Liber Floridus. SPECTROCHIMICA ACTA PART A-MOLECULAR AND BIOMOLECULAR SPECTROSCOPY, 80(1), 125–132. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.saa.2011.03.005

Vermilion

The in situ Raman analysis of the red pigment showed that vermilion (HgS) is used as red pigment.

Source

Deneckere, A., De Reu, M., Martens, M., De Coene, K., Vekemans, B., Vincze, L., … Moens, L. (2011). The use of a multi-method approach to identify the pigments in the 12th century manuscript Liber Floridus. SPECTROCHIMICA ACTA PART A-MOLECULAR AND BIOMOLECULAR SPECTROSCOPY, 80(1), 125–132. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.saa.2011.03.005

Not identified yellow

A second type of yellow is a very bright light yellow. This type of yellow can be found on folios 6v, 13r, 88r, 88v, 89r and 260r. The pigment used to create this light yellow colour could not be identified with Raman spectroscopy and XRF spectroscopy. In agreement with the suggestion for the green pigment, we think that an organic yellow lake or dye is used for this type of yellow.

Source

Deneckere, A., De Reu, M., Martens, M., De Coene, K., Vekemans, B., Vincze, L., … Moens, L. (2011). The use of a multi-method approach to identify the pigments in the 12th century manuscript Liber Floridus. SPECTROCHIMICA ACTA PART A-MOLECULAR AND BIOMOLECULAR SPECTROSCOPY, 80(1), 125–132. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.saa.2011.03.005

DE ORDINE ET POSITIONE SIGNORVM.

Source

Lambertus a S. Audomaro, L. a S. Audomaro, Derolez, A., & Strubbe, E. I. (1968). Lamberti S. Audomari canonici Liber floridus : codex autographus bibliothecae universitatis Gandavensis. Gand: Story-Scientia. https://lib.ugent.be/en/catalog/rug01:000066991

Helicę Arcturus Maior habet stellas in capite VII, in singulis humeris singulas, in armo I, in pectore I, in pede priori claras II, in summa caude I, in uentre claram I, in crure posterior duas, in extremo pede II, in cauda III. Fiunt XXII.

Source

Lambertus a S. Audomaro, L. a S. Audomaro, Derolez, A., & Strubbe, E. I. (1968). Lamberti S. Audomari canonici Liber floridus : codex autographus bibliothecae universitatis Gandavensis. Gand: Story-Scientia. https://lib.ugent.be/en/catalog/rug01:000066991

Cęnosura Arcturus Minor habet stellas in uno latere IIII claras in quad /o positas, in cauda claras III. Sub his polus apparet, circum quod sydus totus orbis uerti putatur. Serpens, qui inter Arcturos medius iacet, habet stellas in capite claras V et in toto corpore X.

Source

Lambertus a S. Audomaro, L. a S. Audomaro, Derolez, A., & Strubbe, E. I. (1968). Lamberti S. Audomari canonici Liber floridus : codex autographus bibliothecae universitatis Gandavensis. Gand: Story-Scientia. https://lib.ugent.be/en/catalog/rug01:000066991

Hercules in capite I, in brachio I, in humeris singulis claras, in sinistro cubito I, in manu I, in utrisque ilibus I, in femore II, in pede I, supra dextram manum I, in pelle leonis IIII. Fiunt XVI.

Source

Lambertus a S. Audomaro, L. a S. Audomaro, Derolez, A., & Strubbe, E. I. (1968). Lamberti S. Audomari canonici Liber floridus : codex autographus bibliothecae universitatis Gandavensis. Gand: Story-Scientia. https://lib.ugent.be/en/catalog/rug01:000066991

Serpentarius in capite I, in singulis humeris et pedibus I, in sinistra manu III, in dextra IIII, in cubitis singulis et genibus singulas, in crure I. Fiunt XVII, omnes clare. Serpens in ore II, in capite IIII, uscue manum se tenentis II, in flexu xorporis XV. Summa XXIII.

Source

Lambertus a S. Audomaro, L. a S. Audomaro, Derolez, A., & Strubbe, E. I. (1968). Lamberti S. Audomari canonici Liber floridus : codex autographus bibliothecae universitatis Gandavensis. Gand: Story-Scientia. https://lib.ugent.be/en/catalog/rug01:000066991

Boetes Artophilax habet stellas in dextera manu IIII, que non óccidunt; in capite I, in singulis humeris et mamillis singulas, in dextro cubito I, inter genua I, in singulis pedibus singulas.

Source

Lambertus a S. Audomaro, L. a S. Audomaro, Derolez, A., & Strubbe, E. I. (1968). Lamberti S. Audomari canonici Liber floridus : codex autographus bibliothecae universitatis Gandavensis. Gand: Story-Scientia. https://lib.ugent.be/en/catalog/rug01:000066991

Scorpius habet stellas in singulis cornibus binas, In fronte III claras, in dorso III, ** uentre II, in cauda V, in aculeo II. Fiunt XIX. Hic in spatium duorum signorum partitur.
